text: Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan de ren, ta yao shi tamen xiangshou wanquan de baochou, bingqie ba ta de enhui jia ci tamen. Zhiyu jujue wei pu, erqie wangzizunda zhe, ta yao yi tongku de xingfa chengzhi tamen. Chu zhenzhu wai, tamen buneng wei ziji huode renhe baohu zhe, ye buneng huode renhe yuanzhu zhe.
